plot_projections(process_function: callable = <function Projections.<lambda>>)[source]
plot_shift(shift_type: ShiftManagerMemberType, title: str | None = None, plot_kwargs: dict = {})[source]

Plot different kinds of shifts stored in the ShiftManager object.

Parameters:

  • shift_type (ShiftManagerMemberType) – The type of shift to plot. Can be entered as the

  • "applied_shift_total" (strings)

  • "applied_shift_seperate"

  • "staged_shift". (or)

  • title (str) – If included, title will override the default titling.

plot_shift_summary(plot_kwargs: dict = {})[source]

Show plots summarizing all of the applied shifts and the staged shift
